summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation and the East Duwamish South Greenbelt, accepting an offer of Olympic Foundry Company to convey a portion of the Henry Van Asselt Donation Land Claim No. 50 to The City of Seattle for park, recreation, open space and greenbelt purposes, providing for the payment therefor from funds previously authorized, authorizing an easement back to provide access and authorizing acceptance of the deed upon delivery.
